description: This file provides an interface for administrative user management functionalities within a frontend application. It includes methods to check API availability, fetch users, and update user roles by communicating with backend endpoints.

methods.name: getAdminApiStatus()
methods.description: Determines if the admin API is configured by checking the API base URL.

methods.name: fetchUsers()
methods.description: Fetches the list of users from the backend admin endpoint if available.

methods.name: updateUserRole({ userId, email, role })
methods.description: Updates a user's role via the backend admin endpoint, if configured.

ctags.name: updateUserRole
ctags.pattern: /^export async function updateUserRole({ userId, email, role }) {$/
